AWS.description: Settings for configuring the AWS SDK for .NET

AllowAutoRedirect.description: This flag controls if .NET HTTP infrastructure should follow redirection responses (e.g. HTTP 307 - temporary redirect).

AuthenticationRegion.description: Overrides the region used when computing AWS signature.

BufferSize.description: The BufferSize controls the buffer used to read in from input streams and write out to the request.

ClientAppId.description: ClientAppId is an optional application specific identifier that can be set. When set it will be appended to the User-Agent header of every request in the form of app/{ClientAppId}.

DefaultsMode.description: Sets the mode that SDK should use when setting default values for settings.

DisableHostPrefixInjection.description: Host prefix injection prefixes the service endpoint with request members from APIs which use this feature.

DisableLogging.description: If true logging for this client will be disabled.

DisableRequestCompression.description: Controls whether request payloads are automatically compressed for supported operations.

EndpointDiscoveryCacheLimit.description: The maximum number of discovered endpoints that can be stored within the cache for the client.

EndpointDiscoveryEnabled.description: The flag indicating if endpoint discovery should be enabled or disabled for operations that are not required to use endpoint discovery.

FastFailRequests.description: Under Adaptive retry mode the SDK will use fail fast logic.

HttpClientCacheSize.description: Controls the number of HttpClients cached for service clients.

IgnoreConfiguredEndpointUrls.description: If set to true the SDK will ignore the configured endpointUrls in the config file or in the environment variables.

LogMetrics.description: Flag on whether to log metrics for service calls.

LogResponse.description: If this property is set to true, the service response is logged.

MaxErrorRetry.description: How many retry HTTP requests an SDK should make for a single SDK operation invocation before giving up.

Profile.description: The AWS credential profiles the service client should be configured for.

ProfilesLocation.description: The path to where the AWS credential profile is configured. By default this is configured at ~/.aws/credentials.

ProgressUpdateInterval.description: The interval at which progress update events are raised for upload operations.

Region.description: The AWS region the service client should be configured for.

RequestMinCompressionSizeBytes.description: Minimum size in bytes that a request body should be to trigger compression.

ResignRetries.description: Flag on whether to resign requests on retry or not.

RetryMode.description: The current mode in use for request retries and influences the value returned from MaxErrorRetry.

ServiceURL.description: Overrides the region for the service clients and sends requests to the indicated url.

SessionName.description: The session name for the assumed session using the SessionRoleArn.

SessionRoleArn.description: If set this role will be assumed using the resolved AWS credentials.

ThrottleRetries.description: Enables the SDK to use intelligent throttle retry logic.

Timeout.description: The timeout that is set on the HttpClient Timeout for configuring the wait time for requests time out.

UseAlternateUserAgentHeader.description: If true the service client will use the x-amz-user-agent header instead of the User-Agent header to report version and environment information to the AWS service. This is commonly used in Blazor WebAssembly applications.

UseDualstackEndpoint.description: Configures the endpoint calculation for a service to go to a dual stack (ipv6 enabled) endpoint for the configured region.

UseFIPSEndpoint.description: Configures the endpoint calculation to go to a FIPS endpoint for the configured region.

UseHttp.description: If true clients will attempt to use HTTP protocol if the target endpoint supports it.
